Sufficient knowledge of Portuguese language required.
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Existence of an effective link with the national community required.

No convictions for committing a crime punished with a prison sentence of 3 or more years, no danger or threat to security or national defence, for involvement in activities related to the practice of terrorism.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries

specification: Person is a minor who was born in Portugal and who has completed elementary school or high school there.; Person is a minor covered by a protection measure and is hosted by a public, cooperative, social or private institution with a cooperation agreement with the Portuguese State. Other conditions: sufficient knowledge of Portuguese language, no convictions for committing a crime punished with a prison sentence of 3 or more years, no danger or threat to security or national defence, for involvement in activities related to the practice of terrorism (see A06).
category: Generally applicable provision (based on period of residence or schooling in country)

specification: Person has been the spouse or unmarried partner (recognised by a court of law) of a citizen for more than 3 years. No effective connection to community requirement. Other conditions: no effective link with another country, no conviction for committing a crime that carries a prison sentence of 3 years or more, and no public function or non-obligatory service for a foreign state.

Person is a minor who is adopted by a citizen after the entry in force of the Law 37/1981. Other conditions: no effective link with another country, no conviction for committing a crime that carries a prison sentence of 3 years or more, and no public function or non-obligatory service for a foreign state.;
Person (minor or adult) was adopted by a citizen before the entry in force of the Law 37/1981. Other conditions: no effective link with another country, no conviction for committing a crime that carries a prison sentence of 3 years or more, and no public function or non-obligatory service for a foreign state.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification:
Person is an ancestor of a Portuguese citizen of origin. Conditions: residence in Portugal, for at least 5 years immediately before the naturalization<ab>s request, and the ancestry must be established at the moment of the Portuguese citizen<ab>s birth.;
Person was born abroad and is the grandchild of a citizen, who has not lost his or her citizenship. No residence requirement. Other conditions: declaration of will to acquire the Portuguese nationality, proof of an effective connection to the Portuguese community.
category: Generally applicable provision (applies to relatives in ascending and descending line)

specification: Person is a minor, or incapacitated adult, whose parent is acquiring citizenship. Other conditions: no effective link with another country, no conviction for committing a crime that carries a prison sentence of 3 years or more, and no public function or non-obligatory service for a foreign state.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification:
Person is a citizen of another country and a former citizen.;
Person lost citizenship as a minor, or is a woman who lost citizenship due to marriage, or lost citizenship due to voluntary acquisition of citizenship of another country.

Person has Portuguese ancestry or belongs to a Portuguese community abroad. Absence of criminal convictions as indicated in mode A06.; Person is a Sephardic Jew with a demonstrable link to Portugal. Absence of criminal convictions as indicated in mode A06.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has rendered or is called to render relevant services to Portugal or to the Portuguese community. Absence of criminal convictions as indicated in mode A06.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born abroad to a citizen and establishes permanent residence in Paraguay (declaration by parent until age 18 and by person him/herself after age 18).
category: Generational transmission restriction: conditional on birthplace/place of residence /mode under which parent acquired citizenship

specification: Person is an infant found in Paraguay of unknown parentage.

Person has been resident in Paraguay for at least 3 years. Other conditions: work participation, good behaviour, basic knowledge of one of Paraguay's official languages, the history and geography of the country, and of the constitutional provisions dealing with loss of Paraguayan citizenship.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Paraguay for at least 3 years.
category: Less than 5 years of residence required

specification: Basic knowledge of one of Paraguay's official languages.
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Basic knowledge of the history and geography of the country, and of the constitutional provisions dealing with loss of Paraguayan citizenship.

category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)
Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born abroad to a citizen abroad and the child cannot obtain the nationality of the country of birth and is otherwise stateless. Request must be submitted to the Paraguayan consulate or Embassy. The Embassy will send the request to the National Commission for Refugees and Stateless (CONARE), which will decide if the person is stateless and thus refer the case to a judge to declare that the person possesses natural nationality and to register the person in the civil registry.
category: Additional restrictions apply (eg citizenship status of parent)

specification: Person is granted honorary citizenship for having rendered eminent services to Paraguay.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Qatar to a male citizen.
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person is born abroad to a male citizen.
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person born in Qatar to unknown parents.
Person has been resident in the country for at least 25 years. Other conditions: proficient in Arabic, has an income, good character and has physical health.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in the country for at least 25 years.
category: More than 10 years of residence required

specification: Applicant for naturalisation must submit proof that he/she has relinquished original citizenship.

category: Language requirement without certification or test
General requirement without specification (good moral character)
Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Female spouse of a male citizen can apply for naturalisation after 5 years of marriage.
category: Gender restriction: only for female spouse of male citizen (no residence requirement)

specification: Person is born as the child of a naturalised citizen. Citizenship may also be granted, by a decision of the Emir, to the minor children of a naturalised person who had been residing abroad, after 5 years from the date of their first residence in Qatar, provided that they had not reached adulthood at the time of the application. Such minor children of naturalised persons shall,  within 1 year of reaching the age of majority, declare in writing to the Minister of Interior the renunciation of citizenship if they want to keep their original citizenship. The adult children of a naturalised person may be granted citizenship by an Emiri decision after 15 years have elapsed since taking up residence in Qatar.
category: Age restriction: only if child is a minor

specification: Person proves to be of Qatari origin in accordance with QAT 1 (sub-articles 1.1, 1.2, and 1.4). Other conditions: has been resident in Qatar for at least 3 consecutive years, has a lawful means of income sufficient to meet his needs, has a reputation for honesty and is of good reputation. Citizenship is granted by an Emiri decision.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is the wife of someone who is acquiring citizenship by naturalisation.  Provided that her stay with the male citizen in Qatar extends for a period of at least 5 years after the date the husband acquired citizenship.
category: Gender restriction: only applies to female spouses (with residence requirement)

specification: Person is the child below legal age of a parent who is acquiring citizenship by naturalisation.  Acquisition can only take place after 5 years from the date of the child's first residence in Qatar, provided that the child had not reached adulthood at the time of the application.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person has lost citizenship due to acquisition of a foreign citizenship (only if the public interest so requires).;Person is a former citizen by birth who has resided in Qatar for at least 3 years, has lawful means of income, and of good character.
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds

specification: Person has rendered great service to the country, has particular skills the country needs, or person is a student who excels by showing promising scientific ability. Based on the requirements of the public interest, Qatari citizenship may be granted in such cases to the persons concerned, who may also retain their original citizenship.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Romania to a citizen.
Person is born abroad to a citizen.
Person is found in Romania of unknown parentage.
Person is an adult who is born in and resident in Romania. Other conditions: see A06.
category: Age restriction: person can only acquire citizenship after reaching the age of majority

specification: Person has been resident in Romania for 8 years. Other conditions: good behaviour and loyalty to Romania, no threat to national security, sufficient resources to support him/herself, proficiency in Romanian language and knowledge of the country's culture, history, Constitution and national anthem.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Romania for 8 years.

category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Knowledge of the country's culture, history, Constitution and national anthem required.
Good behaviour and loyalty to Romania, no threat to national security.
category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)
Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is the spouse of a citizen and has resided in Romania, in common household, with the spouse for at least 5 years. Other conditions: see A06.

Person (adult or minor) is adopted by two persons who are both citizens, or by one single person who is a citizen. Consent required if person is an adult.;
Person is adopted by two persons of whom only one is a citizen. By mutual consent of parents or by court decision based on person's best interests. Consent required if person is 14 years or older.
category: Generally applicable provision (adopted child can be minor or adult)

specification: Person is a second generation descendant of a former citizen. No residence requirement. Other conditions: see A06 (except proficiency in Romanian language and knowledge of the country's culture, history, Constitution and national anthem). Or person is a descendant up to the 3rd degree of a former citizen who lost citizenship for reasons not attributable to him/her. No residence requirement. Other conditions: see A06 (except sufficient means to support him/herself, proficiency in Romanian language and knowledge of country's culture, history, Constitution and national anthem).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is a minor both whose parents are acquiring citizenship. In case only one parent is acquiring citizenship: by parents' mutual consent or by a court decision based on child's best interests. Consent is required if the child is 14 years or older.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person is a former citizen. No residence requirement. Other conditions: see A06 (except proficiency in Romanian language and knowledge of the country's culture, history, Constitution and national anthem). Or person is a former citizen, by birth or adoption, and lost citizenship for reasons not attributable to him/her. No residence requirement. Other conditions: see A06 (except sufficient means to support him/herself, proficiency in Romanian language and knowledge of the country's culture, history, Constitution and national anthem).
Person is a citizen of an EU Member State who is born in and resident in Romania, or has been resident there for 4 years. Other conditions: see A06.
Person is a refugee who is born in and resident in Romania, or has been resident there for 4 years. Other conditions: A06.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)
Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has invested 1 million euros or more in Romania and is born in and resident there, or has been resident in Romania for 4 years. Other conditions: see A06.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Russia to a citizen

Person is born abroad to two citizens, to a citizen who is his or her sole parent, to a citizen and a stateless or missing person, or to a citizen and a foreigner if the person would otherwise become stateless.
Person is found in Russia, is of unknown parentage and under the age 18, and his or her parents are not identified within 6 months since the person is found.
Person is born in Russia to foreigners or stateless persons and is not entitled to citizenship of the parents' country.

Person has been resident in Russia for 5 years uninterrupted, under the permanent residence permit (It may take many years before a foreigner qualifies for the permanent residence permit). Other conditions: observing the laws of Russia, lawful means of subsistence, application filed for renunciation of the foreign citizenship, proficiency in Russian language, swear an oath of loyalty. Naturalisation can be rejected due to the person's criminal record and participation in anti-state or terrorist activities.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Russia for 5 years uninterrupted, under the permanent residence permit (note: it may take many years before a foreigner qualifies for the permanent residence permit).
Application must have been filed for renunciation of a foreign citizenship (citizens of Tajikistan or exempted from this requirement on the basis of a bilateral treaty).

category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Person must take an oath of loyalty.
Person must observe the laws of Russia. Naturalisation can be rejected due to the person's criminal record and participation in anti-state or terrorist activities.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries

specification: Person must have lawful means of subsistence.
Person has been married to a citizen for 3 years and lives in Russia. Other conditions: see A06 (except residency requirement).

Person has at least one parent who is a citizen of Russia and who lives in Russia. Other conditions: see A06 (except residency requirement).;
Person is a minor, has one parent who is a citizen, and that parent applies for the child's citizenship. Consent of the other parent is necessary if the child resides abroad.  If person is over the age of 14, his or her consent is required.
category: Generally applicable provision (child can be minor or adult)

specification: Person is a minor and adopted by two citizens, or one citizen and one stateless person, or the sole adopter is a citizen. Citizenship is acquired from the moment of adoption, upon an application by the adopter who is a citizen. If the child is adopted by one citizen and one foreigner, upon an application from both parents. If the child and the adopters reside in Russia, and no application has been submitted within a year after adoption, the child acquires citizenship anyway.  If person is over the age of 14, his or her consent is required.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person is a parent of a citizen who resides in Russia. Other conditions: see A06 (except residence requirement). Additional conditions: person is unable to work and the child who is a citizen is and over 18 is able to work, or the child who is a citizen is under 18 or has limited legal capacity and his or her other parent is either dead, of limited legal capacity, or has limitations on his or her parental rights.
category: Generational restriction: only if person is a parent of a citizen

specification:
Person is a minor and both parents or the sole parent are/is acquiring citizenship.;
Person is a minor, one of the parents is acquiring citizenship, and either the child lives in Russia or the other parent is a stateless person. Citizenship is acquired upon application by the parent who is acquiring citizenship. If the other parent is a foreigner and the child lives abroad, the child can acquire citizenship upon an application from both parents. Consent is required if person is over 14.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person is a former citizen and has resided in Russia for 3 years under the permanent residence permit. Other conditions: see A06.

article:
RUS 13(4), 14(1)(c);
RUS 14(8), Decree No. 187 of 24 April 2019.
specification:
Person possesses the citizenship of one of the states that were part of the former USSR, and has served for at least 3 years in the military forces of Russia as a contractor. Other conditions: see A06 (except residence requirement).;
Person is a former USSR citizen, was born in the Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic and is a citizen of Afghanistan, Iraq, Yemen or Syria. Other conditions: see A06 (except residency requirement, means of subsistence and proficiency in Russian language).

category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification:
Person has received a Russian passport before 1 January 2010, but was later found by a competent authority not to have Russian citizenship, and who is a citizen of a foreign state but not in possession of a document proving the right of residence in a foreign state. Other conditions: see A06 (except residency requirement, means of subsistence and proficiency in Russian language).;
Person is in the situation as described above but does not possess a foreign citizenship. Other conditions:  Russian passport was not obtained by knowingly providing untruthful information or engaging in fraud, no extradition to a foreign government for criminal proceedings, no previous renunciation of Russian citizenship, and no acquisition of citizenship of another state or a document certifying the right of legal residence in another state after having received the Russian passport. Citizenship is considered to have been acquired from the date that initial issue of a Russian passport took place.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is a recognised refugee or is enjoying political asylum in Russia. Other conditions: see A06 (except residency requirement is reduced to 1 year).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is stateless, previously possessed citizenship of the Soviet Union, and has resided and continues to reside in one of the former republics of the Soviet Union. Other conditions: see A06 (except residency requirement).
category: Additional restrictions apply (eg citizenship status of parent)

specification:
Person has high achievements in science, technology or culture, or has professional or other qualifications that are of interest to Russia. Other conditions: see A06 (but residency requirement is reduced to 1 year). Persons having special merits to Russia can be naturalised without complying with any of the conditions for regular naturalisation.;
Person received a professional degree in the Russian Federation after 2002 and worked for a minimum of 3 years in Russia. Other conditions: see A06 (except residency requirement).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is a citizen of one of the states that used to be in the USSR, and has served for at least 3 years in the military forces of Russia as a contractor. Other conditions: see A06 (except residency requirement).

category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Rwanda to a citizen.
Person is born abroad a to a citizen.
Person is born in Rwanda to unknown parents. A newborn baby found in Rwanda shall be presumed born in Rwanda.
Person is born in Rwanda to stateless parents or cannot acquire the citizenship of one of parents.
Person is born in Rwanda to foreign parents and applies for citizenship.
category: Generally applicable provision (before age of majority)

specification: Person has been resident in Rwanda for at least 5 years. Other conditions: owner of sustainable activities in Rwanda, good behaviour and morals, not convicted to imprisonment of 6 months or more, respect Rwandan culture and be patriotic, not subject to a non-cancelled expulsion, not characterised by genocide ideology, not a burden on the state or the people.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Rwanda for at least 5 years.
Person must respect Rwandan culture and be patriotic
Person must be of good behaviour and morals, not convicted to imprisonment of 6 months or more, not subject to a non-cancelled expulsion, not characterised by genocide ideology.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries and general moral character condition applies

specification: Person is the owner of sustainable activities in Rwanda, not a burden on the state or the people.
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has been married to a Rwandan citizen for at least 3 years.
Person is a minor child who is adopted by a citizen.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person or an ancestor lost citizenship between 1959-1994 upon acquisition of another citizenship and person re-establishes residence in Rwanda. Cannot recover if deprived of citizenship, nor if a security threat.; Person or an ancestor lost citizenship between 1959-1994 upon acquisition of another citizenship and person remains outside of Rwanda. Cannot recover if deprived of citizenship, nor if a security threat.
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds
Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is 'of interest to Rwanda'. Conditions under A06 may be waived, except for residence and owner of sustainable activities.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born inside the Kingdom to a Saudi father, or to a Saudi mother and an unknown father; Person is born inside the Kingdom to a non-Saudi father and Saudi mother may be granted citizenship by decision of the Minister of Interior following a declaration in the year between his/her 18 and 19 years old and fulfiling the requirements under SAU 8(a-c).
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person is born abroad to a Saudi father, or to a Saudi mother and unknown father.
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person is found inside the Kingdom and is considered born in it unless the opposite is proven. Same for foundlings born in the Kingdom. Or person is born to unknown parents.

Person has had a permanent resident permit (kiqama) inside the Kingdom for 10 years continuously as a minimum. Other conditions: is above legal age, no mental illness, person must be of good character and may not have been sentenced to imprisonment for more than six months for an offence related to public order and morality, legal income, has an occupation that is in demand in Saudi Arabia (unless he/she is the child of an alien mother and an unknown father), knowledge of the Arab language, proof that he/she will renounce his/her original citizenship. The decision is made based on an additional list of requirements by a Committee of the Executive Regulation of the Saudi Citizenship System as featured in the citizenship law. Note that under article 20 of the citizenship law it states that residency period will be reset if the applicant after filing his application left the kingdom for more than 12 months using his existing passport, or if before filing his application they left the kingdom for more than 6 months.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has had a permanent resident permit (kiqama) inside the Kingdom for 10 years continuously as a minimum. Note that under article 20 of the citizenship law it states that residency period will be reset if the applicant after filing his application left the kingdom for more than 12 months using his existing passport, or if before filing his application they left the kingdom for more than 6 months.
Proof that person will renounce his/her original citizenship required.
Knowledge of the Arab language required.
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Person must be of good character and may not have been sentenced to imprisonment for more than six months for an offence related to public order and morality.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries and general moral character condition applies

specification: Person must have a legal income, person has an occupation that is in demand in Saudi Arabia (unless he/she is the child of an alien mother and an unknown father).
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is the wife of a male citizen. Other conditions: renunciation of citizenship of another country.
category: Gender restriction: only for female spouse of male citizen (no residence requirement)

specification: Person is the wife of someone who is acquiring Saudi citizenship. Unless she decides within the first year to keep her original citizenship.
category: Gender restriction: only applies to female spouses (without residence requirement)

specification: Person is the minor child of a father who is acquiring citizenship and the child is residing in Saudi Arabia. Unless the person recovers his/her father's original citizenship within 1 year from reaching the age of 18.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person is the wife of a foreigner and lost her citizenship through obtaining the citizenship of her husband. She has the right to recover her citizenship in case of divorce and return to the Kingdom.
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds

specification: Person is born in Sudan to a father who is a citizen.; Person is born in Sudan to a mother who is a citizen and the child applies for citizenship. (Note: constitution provides that the child of a father or mother has an inalienable right to citizenship. Definition of 'father' in the act includes mother if born out of wedlock or if descent not established to father.)
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person is born outside Sudan to a father who is a citizen.; Person is born outside Sudan to a mother who is a citizen and the person applies for citizenship. (Note: constitution provides that the child of a father or mother has an inalienable right to citizenship.  Definition of 'father' in the act includes mother if born out of wedlock or if descent not established to father. A person born outside Sudan to a parent who is a citizen by naturalisation will be a citizen by birth if the parent has domicile in Sudan.)
Person is found as a deserted minor of unknown parents.

Person has been lawfully and continuously resident in Sudan for 10 years or more. Other conditions: complete capacity, good morals and not convicted of a crime against honour or honesty, sound mind, lawful way of earning a living.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been lawfully and continuously resident in Sudan for 10 years or more.
Good morals and not convicted of a crime against honour or honesty.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries and general moral character condition applies

specification: Person has lawful way of earning a living.
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is a woman married to a citizen and has been resident in Sudan with her husband for at least 2 years.
Person is the minor child of a father who is acquiring citizenship.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person is born in Senegal to a citizen.
Person is born abroad to a citizen.
Person is born in Senegal to a parent also born there.
Person is found in Senegal as a child of unknown parents.

Person has been habitually resident in Senegal for at least 10 years. Other conditions: good character, not convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment, good mental and physical health (unless illness contracted in service of the state), not ever expelled.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been habitually resident in STP for at least 5 years
Good character, not convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment, not expelled.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries and general moral character condition applies

specification: Person is of good mental and physical health (unless illness contracted in service of the state).
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has been married to a citizen for at least 5 years. Government may oppose within 1 year.
Person is a child who has been fully adopted by a citizen.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person is the minor unmarried child of a person who is acquiring citizenship.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person is presumed to have been born in Senegal to a parent also born there if the person has habitual residence in Senegal and has always behaved and been treated as a citizen.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has rendered important services or naturalisation represents an important interest. Other conditions: see A06 (except residence period may be reduced to 5 years).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has served for 5 years in the Senegalese administration or a public institution. Other conditions: see A06 (except residence period may be reduced to 5 years).
category: Other restriction: only for public service

specification: Person is born in Singapore to a citizen. Unless born to a father who is a foreign diplomat, or to a father who is an enemy alien and the child was born in a place then under occupation by the enemy.

Person is born to a citizen by birth, registration or descent. Citizenship is not acquired if the child is not registered within 1 year after birth, or if the child acquired the citizenship of the country of birth and the parent is a citizen by registration. In case the parent is a citizen by descent, the parent needs to have resided in Singapore prior to the person's birth for a total of 5 years or for 2 out of the 5 years immediately preceding the person's birth.
category: Generational transmission restriction: conditional on birthplace/place of residence /mode under which parent acquired citizenship

specification: Person is a newborn child found in Singapore of unknown and unascertainable parentage.

Person is born in Singapore to parents who are not citizens. The government may, where it considers it just and fair and having regard to all circumstances prevailing at the time of the application, confer citizenship upon the person.

Person has been resident in Singapore for 12 months immediately prior to the application, and was resident in the country for 10 out of 12 years prior to the application. Other conditions: good character, elementary knowledge of English, Malay, Mandarin or Tamil (unless the person has attained the age of 45 or is deaf or dumb), intent  to make Singapore his/her permanent home, renunciation of citizenship of another country, and oath of allegiance. Acquisition by registration is not possible if the person has once renounced or been deprived of Singapore citizenship.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Singapore for 12 months immediately prior to the application, and was resident in the country for 10 out of 12 years prior to the application.
Renunciation of citizenship of another country required.
Elementary knowledge of English, Malay, Mandarin or Tamil (unless the person has attained the age of 45 or is deaf or dumb).; Adequate knowledge of the national language.
category: Language requirement without certification or test
General requirement without specification (good moral character)

specification: Person is the female spouse of a male citizen, and has been continuously resident in Singapore for 2 years immediately prior to the application. Other conditions: good character, intent to reside permanently in Singapore, renunciation of citizenship of another country, and oath of allegiance.
category: Gender restriction: only for female spouse of male citizen (with residence requirement)

specification: Person is the child under the age of 21 of a citizen and is resident in Singapore.
category: Age restriction: only if child is a minor

specification: Person is the child under the age of 21 of a citizen, is resident in Singapore, and has been adopted by an order of a court in accordance with the provisions of any law in force in Singapore. References to a person's father or to his parent or to one of his parents shall be construed as references to the adopter.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person is the child of a deceased citizen.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is an industrialist investing a minimum amount of $250,000 in Singapore. Other conditions: see A06 but the '10 out of 12 years' requirement may be waived if the person resided in Singapore for 5 out of 6 years, or at the discretion of the Government.; The Global Investor Programme allows  foreign investors investing at least S$2.5 million to apply for citizenship after fulfiling  at least two years of permanent residence. Each application is considered based on merits.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person born in Solomon Islands after independence day (7 July 1978) if at the date of birth either parent is, or would but for his or her death have been, a citizen.

Every person born on or after Independence Day (7 July 1978) whether within or outside Solomon Islands, shall become a citizen of Solomon Islands if the date of birth either parent is, or would but for his/her death have been, a citizen.

Person is ordinarily resident in Solomon Islands for five of the last ten years, intention to reside or maintain close and continuing relationship with Solomon Islands, good character, knowledge of English, Pidgin or a vernacular of Solomon Islands that is sufficient for normal conversational purposes, respects the culture and way of life, understands the rights, privileges, responsibilities and duties of citizenship.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person is ordinarily resident in Solomon Islands for five of the last ten years, intention to reside or maintain close and continuing relationship with Solomon Islands.
Knowledge of English, Pidgin or a vernacular of Solomon Islands that is sufficient for normal conversational purposes.
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Person respects the culture and way of life, understands the rights, privileges, responsibilities and duties of citizenship.

category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)

specification: Person is married to a citizen by birth for at least 5 years. Person must also be of good character and likely to reside in or maintain a close and continuing relationship with Solomon Islands.

At least one parent, grandparent or great grandparent is or was a birth citizen. Person must also be of good character and likely to reside in or maintain a close and continuing relationship with Solomon Islands
category: Generally applicable provision (applies to relatives in ascending and descending line)

specification: A child of an applicant may be included in application for naturalisation
category: Generally applicable provision (child can be minor or adult)

specification: A person who has lost or renounced their birth citizenship is eligible to resume their birth citizenship.

Person is born in Sierra Leone and parent or grandparent was also born in Sierra Leone and of negro descent. Note: the intention appears to be for citizenship by descent also to apply to those born in the country, but the drafting does not in fact achieve this result, omitting a person whose parent was a citizen at the time of birth but neither parent nor any grandparent were also born in Sierra Leone.
category: Group restriction: only if citizen parent is member of a particular group, race or religion

specification: Person is born abroad to a parent who is a citizen and is of negro African descent.
category: Group restriction: only if citizen parent is member of a particular group, race or religion

specification: Person is born in Sierra Leone and one parent or any grandparent was also born there and is of negro African descent.
category: Group restriction: only if parent is member of a particular group, race or religion

specification: Person is of negro African descent and was born in the country provided that neither parent is a citizen and father is not with diplomatic status nor an enemy alien.
category: Group restriction: only if person is member of a particular group, race or religion

specification: Person has been resident in Sierra Leone for at least 15 years. Other conditions: knowledge of a language in use in Sierra Leone, good character, would be a good citizen (if negro African) or would make useful and substantial contribution to the advancement, progress and well-being of Sierra Leone.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Sierra Leone for at least 15 years.

specification: Person has knowledge of a language in use in Sierra Leone.

specification: Person would make useful and substantial contribution to the advancement, progress and well-being of Sierra Leone (if not negro African).

specification: Person is a woman married to a citizen.
category: Gender restriction: only for female spouse of male citizen (no residence requirement)

specification: Person is under the age of 21 years, is born outside Sierra Leone, and parent has acquired citizenship by naturalisation.
category: Age restriction: only if child is a minor

specification: Person whose citizenship depended on the status of his father shall not cease to be entitled because of father's death.
category: Generational restriction: only applies to child or grandchild

specification: Person is a former citizen who lost citizenship on acquisition of another.
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds

specification: Person has been resident in Sierra Leone for at least 8 years (if either parent is of negro African descent. Other conditions: knowledge of a language in use in Sierra Leone, good character, would be a good citizen.

specification: Person is born abroad to a citizen.

specification: Person has been resident in El Salvador for 5 years.
Person manifests the will to adhere to the law and authorities of El Salvador.
category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)

specification: Person is the spouse of a citizen and has been resident in El Salvador for 2 years, either before or after the marriage was celebrated and manifests the will to adhere to the law and authorities of El Salvador.

article: Const 91 and Articles 278 and 281 Immigration law 2019.
specification: Person is a former citizen by birth or by naturalization.

Person is a citizen of a country formerly part of the Federal Republic of Central America and has been resident in El Salvador for 1 year.;
Person is a citizen by birth of Spain or an Hispanoamerican country and has been resident in El Salvador for 1 year. Other conditions: see A06.

Person who is a refugee and who has obtained definitive residence in the country can apply for citizenship three years after the application to obtain the status of refugee.  Applicant can be exempted from any requirement he cannot fulfil.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person who is stateless and who has obtained definitive residence in the country can apply for citizenship three years after the application to obtain the status of stateless. Applicant can be exempted from any requirement he cannot fulfil.
Person has rendered notable services to El Salvador.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Somalia to a father who is a citizen.; Person is born to a Somalia mother. Other conditions: see A06 (but residence period may be reduced to 2 years).

specification: Person is born abroad to a father who is a citizen.; Person is born to a Somalia mother. Other conditions: see A06 (but residence period may be reduced to 2 years).
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person is born in Somalia of unknown parents. A child found in the territory shall be presumed to have been born there.

category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Somalia for at least 7 years.

category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)

specification: Person is a woman married to a Somali citizen.
category: Gender restriction: only for female spouse of male citizen (no residence requirement)

specification: Person is the wife of a person who is acquiring citizenship.
category: Gender restriction: only applies to female spouses (without residence requirement)

specification: Person is the minor child of a father who is acquiring citizenship.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person was a citizen by operation of law and lost citizenship. Other conditions: establishes residence in Somalia and renounces any other citizenship.
Person is a Somali residing in Somalia and declares willingness to renounce any other citizenship. Somali is defined as 'any person who by origin, language or tradition belongs to the Somali nation'.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has rendered exceptional services to the republic. Other conditions: see A06.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Serbia to a citizen.
Person is found in Serbia of unknown parentage.
Person is born in Serbia to parents of unknown citizenship or without citizenship or the person is stateless.
Person is born in Serbia, has been uninterruptedly resident there for 2 years before the application, and submits a written statement of loyalty.

specification: Person has been uninterruptedly resident in Serbia for at least 3 years. Other conditions: legal capacity, renunciation or automatic loss of citizenship of another country (unless legally impossible or unreasonable), written statement of loyalty.

specification: Person has been uninterruptedly resident in Serbia for at least 3 years.
category: Less than 5 years of residence required

specification: Renunciation or automatic loss of citizenship of another country (unless legally impossible or unreasonable) required.

Person is a minor who is adopted by a citizen.;
Person is adopted by a citizen (in a weak adoption) and resides in Serbia with the adoptive parent. Consent is required if the person is over the age of 14.

specification: Person's parent was a former citizen. Other conditions: legal capacity and written statement of loyalty.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is the spouse of someone who acquires citizenship under mode A12. Other conditions: person submits a written statement of loyalty. Other conditions: person submits a written statement of loyalty.
Person is a minor both whose parents are acquiring citizenship, or only one parent is acquiring citizenship and the other parent consents to the child acquiring citizenship.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person has legal capacity, submits a written statement of loyalty, and was released from citizenship, or acquired foreign citizenship, or was released from or renounced citizenship at his/her parents' request.

Person has legal capacity, submits a written statement of loyalty, and is a member of the Serbian nation without permanent residence in Serbia, or was born in another republic of the SFRY (Socialist Federal Republic Yugoslavia) and had citizenship of that republic or is a citizen of another state that was created on the territory of SFRY, or belongs to another nation or ethnicity from the Serbian territory without permanent residence in Serbia. No renunciation requirement.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is a recognised refugee from another republic of the former SFRY who had the citizenship of that republic or has the citizenship of another state formed in the territory of the former SFRY. category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has legal capacity and acquisition of citizenship is in the interest of Serbia.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in South Sudan to a citizen.

Person has been resident for at least 10 years. Other conditions: sound mind, not convicted of any offence related to honesty and moral turpitude or other serious offence.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident for at least 10 years.
Person is not convicted of any offence related to honesty and moral turpitude or other serious offence.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries

specification: Person is the spouse of a citizen and has been living in South Sudan with the spouse for at least 5 years.

n.a. (References to citizenship of a person's father shall be construed as references to status of the father at his death. Gender discrimination here, even though law refers to mother or father equally).

category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person was at the time of coming into force of the act resident, or parents or grandparents were resident, in South Sudan since 1956.

specification: Person has served South Sudan in a capacity which is considered to have been in the national interest.

specification: Person is born in STP to a citizen.
Person is born abroad to a citizen in the service of the state.; Person is born abroad to a citizen and declares that s/he wishes to acquire citizenship.
category: Generational transmission restriction: conditional on birthplace/place of residence /mode under which parent acquired citizenship

specification: Person is born in STP to foreign parents who reside there and are not in the service of another state.
Person is a newborn child found in the territory.
Person is born in STP and does not possess another citizenship or parents are stateless or of unknown citizenship.

Person has been habitually resident in STP for at least 5 years. Other conditions: sufficient knowledge of Portuguese or another national language (except if person is a citizen of Angola, Brasil, Cape Verde, Guinea Bissau, Mozambique and Portugal), guarantees of civic and moral integration into STP society, be able to manage self and secure subsistence. State may oppose if person does not fulfil conditions, is not integrated into STP society, has carried out acts against sovereignty of the state or has committed a crime punishable by a serious penalty under STP law.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been habitually resident in STP for at least 5 years
Sufficient knowledge of Portuguese or another national language required  (except if person is a citizen of Angola, Brasil, Cape Verde, Guinea Bissau, Mozambique and Portugal).
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: State may oppose if person is not integrated into STP society

category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries

specification: Person is able to secure subsistence.

Person is fully adopted by a citizen.
category: Generally applicable provision (adopted child can be minor or adult)

specification: Person is minor child of a person who is acquiring citizenship under mode A06 and citizenship is requested for the child.;Person is the minor child of a person who acquired citizenship.

specification: Person is born in Suriname to a citizen.

Person is born in Suriname and does not have citizenship of another country.;Person is born in Suriname and is stateless. Other conditions: person is resident in Suriname and no danger to public order, morals or health.

Person is a minor and the father -who was a citizen at the time of the child's birth- marries the mother or recognises the child.;



Person is a minor and the father -who was not a citizen at the time of the child's birth- marries the mother or recognises the child. Other conditions: the father was a citizen at the time of marriage or recognition, and the child was resident in Suriname at the time of the marriage or recognition.
category: Other restrictions (age, marriage or other conditions apply)

specification:
Person is born in Suriname to a resident parent and has been resident him/herself for 3 years immediately before reaching the age of majority (not applicable to children of foreign diplomats). Application must be lodged within 1 year of reaching the age of majority.;
Person is born in Suriname, has reached the age of majority and holds citizenship of another country. Other conditions: person is resident in Suriname, serious attempt to renounce citizenship of another country after naturalisation (unless legally impossible or unreasonable), and no danger to public order, morals or health.
category: Age restriction: person can only acquire citizenship after reaching the age of majority

specification: Person has been resident in Suriname for 5 years immediately preceding the application.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Suriname for 5 years immediately preceding the application.

Person is a minor born to a mother (who is a citizen) from a previous marriage or whose father is deceased or legally unknown, and the child has been resident in Suriname for at least 1 year before the application. Person him/herself can revoke the acquisition within 1 year after reaching the age of majority.
category: Restricted to period of residence in country

specification: Person has been the spouse of a citizen for 3 years, and both have been resident at the same address in Suriname for 2 years, or person was and is still resident in Suriname for at least five years, or children have been born from the relationship. Spouse must be a citizen at the time of celebration of marriage as well as the time of declaration.
Person is a minor who is adopted by a citizen.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person is born in wedlock (or is legitimated or recognised while a minor) to a father who is acquiring citizenship by naturalisation, or out of wedlock to a mother who is acquiring citizenship by naturalisation. Person him/herself can revoke the acquisition within 1 year after reaching the age of majority.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification:
Person is a former citizen who holds citizenship of another country or is stateless. Other conditions: person is resident in Suriname, serious attempt to renounce citizenship of another country after naturalisation (unless legally impossible or unreasonable), and no danger to public order, morals or health.;

Person is a former citizen who has lost Surinamese citizenship on the basis of SUR 10 or 16 as a minor. Other requirements: reacquisition declaration must take place within 1 year after reaching the age of majority, and person is resident in Suriname. Citizenship is reacquired as of the moment of reaching the age of majority.
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds

specification: Person is of Surinamese origin and has been recognised as such under the PSA Act. category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Acquisition of citizenship is in the interest of Suriname.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is someone of special benefit to Slovakia in the area of economics. Other conditions: see A06 (except residence requirement).

specification: Person is born in Slovenia to a citizen.

Person is born abroad to a citizen and a parent who is unknown, of unknown citizenship or without citizenship, or when the child would otherwise be stateless.;
Person is born abroad to a citizen and a citizen of another country, is between 18 and 36 years of age, and has not previously lost citizenship due to release, renunciation or deprivation.
Person is born in Slovenia of unknown parentage.
Person is born in Slovenia to parents of unknown citizenship or without citizenship.
category: Parental status restriction: only if one or both parents are stateless (additional residence requirement may apply)

specification: Person is an adult who is born and resident in Slovenia since birth. Personal, family, economic, social and other ties binding the person to Slovenia, as well as consequences that a refusal of the application for citizenship would cause, may be taken into account. Other condition: no criminal record, settled tax obligations, does not pose a threat to public order, security or national defence, and oath to respect the free democratic constitutional order of Slovenia.
category: Age restriction: person can only acquire citizenship after reaching the age of majority

specification: Person has been resident in Slovenia for 10 years, of which 5 were continuous, and with a 'settled status' immediately before the application. Other conditions: evidence of renunciation of citizenship of another country (unless the person is stateless or when renunciation is legally impossible or unreasonable), means of subsistence and settled tax obligations, no criminal record, does not pose a threat to public order, security or national defence, knowledge of Slovenian language and oath to respect the free democratic constitutional order of Slovenia.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Slovenia for 10 years, of which 5 were continuous, and with a 'settled status' immediately before the application.
Evidence of renunciation of citizenship of another country (unless the person is stateless or when renunciation is legally impossible or unreasonable) required.
Oath to respect the free democratic constitutional order of Slovenia required.
Person may not have a criminal record, not pose a threat to public order, security or national defence.
category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)

specification: Means of subsistence and settled tax obligations required.
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person attended and successfully completed at least higher education in Slovenia and has been resident there for at least 7 years, continuously for at least 1 year before the application. Other conditions: see A06 (except knowledge of Slovenian language).
category: Restricted to period of schooling in country

specification: Person has been the spouse of a citizen for at least 3 years and has continuously resided in Slovenia for at least 1 year before the application. Other conditions: see A06.

category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person is a direct descendant to the fourth generation of a former citizen and has been resident in Slovenia for at least 1 year prior to the application. Other conditions: see A06 (except renunciation requirement).

specification: Person is a minor one or both whose parents are naturalising in Slovenia and the child has been resident there for at least 1 year. If the child was born in Slovenia, acquisition can occur before the age of 1 year. If  the child has no parents, or parents lost parental rights, petition can be made by a guardian who resides with the child. In all cases, consent is required if the child is above the age of 14.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person has refugee status granted under the Asylum Act and has been resident in Slovenia for 5 uninterrupted years prior to the application. Other conditions: see A06 (unless renunciation requirement).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is without citizenship and has been resident in Slovenia for 5 uninterrupted years prior to the application. Other conditions: see A06 (except renunciation requirement).

Person is an adult whose acquisition of citizenship is beneficial for the country due to scientific, economic, cultural, national or other similar reasons. Other conditions: see A06 (except renunciation requirement and knowledge of Slovenian language). A person who does not meet the requirementof uninterrupted residence in Slovenia and condition of regulated status of a foreigner in the Republic of Slovenia, can still acquire citizenship of the Republic of Slovenia given his/her extra-ordinary achievement in development of the Republic of Slovenia and increasing of the international reputation of Slovenia or international recognition of Slovenia.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is an adult whose acquisition of citizenship is beneficial for the country for economic reasons. Other conditions: see A06 (except renunciation requirement and knowledge of Slovenian language).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Sweden to a citizen.
Person is born abroad to a citizen.
Person is found in Sweden of unknown parentage.
Person is born in Sweden, under the age of 18, stateless since birth and resident in Sweden with a permanent residence permit. Declaration is made by the guardian(s).

Person is a minor who is born abroad and out of wedlock to a father who has been a citizen since the time of the child's birth and a mother who is a citizen of another country. Father must be a citizen at the time of the declaration. Child's consent is required from the age of 12 if the child possesses a foreign citizenship.
category: Other restrictions (age, marriage or other conditions apply)

specification: Person has turned 18, has been resident in Sweden for (in most cases) 5 years with a permanent residence permit. Other conditions: proof of identity and has led and can be expected to lead a respectable life.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Sweden for (in most cases) 5 years with a permanent residence permit.
Person has led and can be expected to lead a respectable life.
category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)

specification: Person is a minor, has a permanent residence permit, has been resident in Sweden for 3 years (2 if stateless) and the guardian(s) makes a declaration before the child turns 18. Child's consent is required from the age of 12 (SWE 7). If 18, 19 or 20 years of age, the person acquires citizenship by declaration if he or she has a permanent residence permit and have been resident in Sweden since the age of 13 (15 if stateless) (SWE 8).
category: Restricted to period of residence in country

specification: Person who is the spouse of a citizen, or living in conditions resembling marriage with a citizen, may be granted exemption from the naturalisation requirements.
Person is a minor whose mother is a citizen of another country and marries a citizen.
category: Age restriction: only if child is a minor

specification: Person is a minor under the age of 12 and adopted by a citizen. The child is adopted in Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Iceland or Norway, or adopted through a foreign adoption decision made in accordance with the Hague Convention (No 54) on Protection of Children and Cooperation in Respect of Intercountry Adoption, or according to Law (2018:1289) on Adoption in International situations.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification:
An unmarried minor residing in the country acquires citizenship together with his or her parent, when the parent acquires citizenship by declaration. The parent should have sole custody of the child or joint custody with the other parent, and that parent is a Swedish citizen. If both parents acquire citizenship by declaration at the same time, the child also acquires citizenship if the parents have joint custody. (SWE 10).;
In a decision concerning naturalisation it shall also be decided whether the applicant's unmarried children under the age of 18 shall acquire Swedish citizenship. (SWE 13).;                                                                                                                An unmarried minor acquires citizenship together with his or her parent, if the parent is a citizen of Denmark, Finland, Iceland or Norway who acquires citizenship by declaration, has reached the age of 18, has been domiciled in the country for the previous five years and has not been sentenced to imprisonment during that period. The parent should have sole custody of the child or has joint custody with the other parent, and that parent is a Swedish citizen. If both parents acquire citizenship by declaration at the same time, the child also acquires citizenship if the parents have joint custody. (SWE 18).;                                                                                                                                                                                                  An unmarried minor acquires citizenship together with his or her parent, if the parent is a former citizen who reacquires citizenship, has been residing in Denmark, Finland, Iceland or Norway since losing citizenship and is domiciled in Sweden. The parent shall have sole custody of the child or has joint custody with the other parent, and that parent is a Swedish citizen. If both parents acquire citizenship by declaration at the same time, the child also acquires citizenship if the parents have joint custody (SWE 19).
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person is a recognised refugee and has been resident in Sweden for 4 years with a permanent residence permit. Other conditions: See mode A06.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is stateless and has been resident in Sweden for 4 years with a permanent residence permit. Other conditions: See mode A06.
If the requirements for naturalisation are not met the applicant may still be naturalised if  there are special reasons for granting citizenship.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Swaziland to a father who is a citizen, or to a mother who is a citizen and the father does not adopt or claim the child.
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person is born abroad to a father who is a citizen who was born in the country, or to a mother who is a citizen who was born in the country and the father does not adopt or claim the child, and the person notifies desire to retain citizenship within 1 year after reaching age of majority.
category: Generational transmission restriction: conditional on birthplace/place of residence /mode under which parent acquired citizenship

specification: Person who is a child of not more than 7 years found in Swaziland shall be deemed to have been born in Swaziland.

Person is ordinarily resident for at least 12 months prior to aplication and 5 years during the previous 7 years. Or person is ordinarily resident for at least 10 years and application is supported by a chief after consultation with chief's council or by 3 reputable citizens.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person is ordinarily resident for at least 12 months prior to aplication and 5 years during the previous 7 years.
Knowledge of SiSwati or English required
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Adequate means of support, person has contributed to development of the country.
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is a woman married to a citizen.
category: Gender restriction: only for female spouse of male citizen (no residence requirement)

specification: Person is a child adopted by a citizen under legislation relating to adoption or customary law.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person born after the death of the father shall be deemed to be a citizen on the same terms as if father were still alive.
category: Generational restriction: only applies to child or grandchild

specification: Person is born in or outside Swaziland before the constitution came into force, and parent was a member of a class of persons generally regarded as Swazi by descent and subsequently declared by law to be citizens of Swaziland.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Seychelles to a citizen.
Person is born abroad to a citizen.; Person was born abroad after independence but before 1979 to a mother who was a citizen.
n.a. (Note: constitution authorises naturalisation but there is no provision in the act.)

Person has lived and studied in Seychelles up to level of secondary education, has returned to work after graduating from a university and has been a permanent resident for at least 5 years. Other conditions: pass language test and not convicted to imprisonment for more than 1 year.
category: Restricted to period of schooling in country

specification: Person has been married to a citizen for at least 10 years and resident in Seychelles for at least 5 years. Other conditions: pass language test, not sentenced to imprisonment for more than 1 year.
Person is a minor child legally adopted by a citizen.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person is a former citizen who renounced for any reason and has returned to Seychelles. Other conditions: pass language test, not sentenced to imprisonment for more than 1 year.
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds

specification: Person is not otherwise a citizen and was born outside Seychelles to a parent or grandparent born in Seychelles.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has done signal honour or rendered distinguished services to Seychelles or is otherwise meritorious, or other special circumstances exist (listed in the act and relating to contributions or connections to Seychelles). Other conditions: legal resident for 15 years, not absent for continuous period of 1 year without permission, 80% marks in language tests in a national language, not sentenced to more than 1 year in prison.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person has invested the equivalent of USD 1million and has supported him or herself for 11 years in Seychelles. Other conditions:  pass language test, and not sentenced to more than 1 year imprisonment.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person born in Syria to a male citizen, or to a female citizen and the father is unknown.
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person is born abroad to a male citizen.
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is a citizen (wedlock condition/supplementary provision may apply)

specification: Person is born in Syria to unknown parents.
Person is born in Syria and would otherwise be stateless.

Person has been resident in Syria for at least 5 years. Other conditions: can read and write Arabic, has an income, good character, may not have been convicted for a dishonoring crime, is in physical health and holds qualifications that may benefit the country.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Syria for at least 5 years.
Person can read and write Arabic.
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Good character, may not have been convicted for a dishonoring crime.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries and general moral character condition applies

specification: Person is in physical health and holds qualifications that may benefit the country.
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is the wife of a male citizen.
category: Gender restriction: only for female spouse of male citizen (no residence requirement)

specification: Upon recommendation by the Minister provided that the children have resided in the country for a minimum of two years.
category: Generally applicable provision (child can be minor or adult)

specification: Person is the wife of a male citizen. Other conditions: minimum 2 years of marriage, and legally residing in the country during marriage.;Person is the wife of a male citizen and is the national of an Arab state, of Syrian origin, or a former Syrian Arab citizen.
category: Gender restriction: only applies to female spouses (with residence requirement)

specification: Person is the child of a parent who is acquiring citizenship by naturalisation, unless the child resides abroad and he/she retains the citizenship of his/her other parent. Child acquires citizenship at the same time as the parent.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Only by a proposal by the Minister when the individual declares his/her intention.

Person is a citizen of another Arab state may have facilitated naturalisation if the minister requests. Other conditions: legal capacity, resident in Syria, good health, good character, not convicted for a dishonoring crime.
Person has special skills. No other conditions prescribed.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Chad to a citizen.
Person is born abroad to a citizen.
Child born in Chad to unknown parents.
Person is born in Chad and has no other citizenship at birth.

Person has been resident in Chad for 15 years. Other conditions: no physical or mental incapacity that could be a charge on the collectivity, no conviction for crime subject to imprisonment. Granted by joint decree of ministers of interior and public health. If decree is not issued within 1 year of application, it is considered rejected.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been resident in Chad for 15 years.
category: More than 10 years of residence required

specification: No conviction for crime subject to imprisonment.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries

specification: No physical or mental incapacity that could be a charge on the collectivity.
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is the spouse of a citizen and requests for citizenship at the time of celebration of the marriage. Government can oppose acquisition of citizenship within 1 year of marriage.
Person is a minor who is adopted by a citizen.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person is a minor whose parents are jointly acquiring citizenship and include the child in their application.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person is a former citizen. Reintegration is granted by decree of minister of interior, with no conditions related to age or time limits. No person who has been deprived of citizenship can be reintegrated unless s/he rendered exceptional services.
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds

specification: Person is of 'African origin' (de souche africain), has been living in Chad for 15 years, and with 'apparent status' as a citizen (possession d'etat de Tchadian).  Conditions to show apparent status: assimilated to a community living in Chad, always been treated as Chadian by the population and the authorities, and of good conduct (bonne vie et moeurs).  Authority responsible for issuing certificates of nationality (the prefet) considers if conditions are shown. Authorities can reject by decree within 1 year after the 15 years required for an application.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person was born in Chad and rendered 'exceptional services'. Other conditions: see A06 (except that 15 years of habitual residence and health conditions do not apply).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Togo to a citizen.
Person is born abroad to a citizen.
Person is born in Togo to parents who were both born there and has habitual residence in Togo and apparent status (possession d'etat) as Togoloese.
category: Gender restriction: only if the father is also born in country

specification: Person is found as a child under the age of 5 in Togo of unknown parents.
Person is born in Togo and cannot claim any other citizenship.

Person has been habitually resident for at least 5 years. Other conditions: over 21 years old, Togo is the centre of principal interests, good character, not sentenced to imprisonment for more than 2 years, good mental and physical health, renounce other citizenship, assimilated to Togolese community especially by knowledge of a Togolese language.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been habitually resident for at least 5 years.
Renunciation of citizenship of another country required.
Person must be assimilated to Togolese community especially by knowledge of a Togolese language.
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Person is of good character, not sentenced to imprisonment for more than 2 years.
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries and general moral character condition applies

specification: Person has good mental and physical health.
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is a woman who marries a citizen (unless she declines citizenship).; Person is a child who marries a Togolese citizen
category: Gender differentiation (residence requirement differs by gender)

specification: Person is the child of a father who is acquiring Togolese citizenship. Other conditions: not married, has not served in army of country of origin, has not been expelled, has not been sentenced to 6 months imprisonment.
category: Age restriction: only if child is minor

specification: Person is a former citizen who is habitually resident in Togo. Other conditions: was not deprived of citizenship (unless exceptional circumstances apply).
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds

specification: Person was born in Togo to foreign parents and has apparent status (possession d'etat) of Togolese since 16 years old, and makes a declaration accepted by the council of ministers.
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Togo of parents whose place of birth is unknown. (Note: unclear whether any of the conditions listed under A06 apply.)
Person has rendered exceptional services to Togo or naturalisation represents an exceptional interest for the country. Other conditions: see A06 (except residence requirement may be waived).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Tajikistan to a citizen.

Person is born abroad to a citizen.
