Person is born in South Africa and has no right to citizenship of any other country. Other conditions: birth is registered in South Africa in accordance with Births and Deaths Registration Act.

Person is born in South Africa to parents who are permanent residents (Note: unclear whether acquisition is automatic).; Person is born in South Africa to parents who are foreigners and not admitted for permanent residence. Other conditions: person has lived in South Africa from birth until majority, and birth is registered in South Africa in accordance with Births and Deaths Registration Act.
category: Generally applicable provision (before age of majority)

specification: Person is a permanent resident and has been ordinarily and legally resident for at least 5 years. Other conditions: good character, can communicate in one of the official languages, adequate knowledge of responsibilities and privileges of citizenship, is a citizen of a country that allows dual citizenship or renounces other citizenship.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person is a permanent resident and has been ordinarily and legally resident for at least 5 years.
Person can communicate in one of the official languages.
category: Language requirement without certification or test

specification: Adequate knowledge of responsibilities and privileges of citizenship required.
Person must be of good character.
category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)

specification: Person is the spouse of a South African citizen, is a permanent resident and has been married and ordinarily resident in South Africa for 'a prescribed period'.
Person is adopted by a citizen and birth is registered in accordance with Births and Deaths Registration Act.
category: Generally applicable provision (adopted child can be minor or adult)

specification: Person fulfils the criteria listed under mode A08 but the spouse is deceased.
category: Spousal restriction: only applies to spouse

specification: Person is a former citizen who lost citizenship and minister is satisfied that the grounds for loss of citizenship no longer exist or are of no consequence.
Person is granted citizenship by the minister in 'exceptional circumstances'. Other conditions: see A06 (except residence period may be waived).
category: Provision exists (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is born in Zambia to a citizen.
Person is born abroad to a citizen.
Person is a child found in Zambia who is, or appears to be, of not more than eight years of age and whose citizenship and parents are not known.
Person was born in Zambia and has been ordinarily resident in Zambia for a period of at least 5 years. (Note: Act does not provide modalities.)
category: Generally applicable provision (before age of majority)

specification: Person was born outside Zambia, has or had an ancestor who is, or was, a citizen and has been ordinarily resident in Zambia for a period of at least 5 years or has been ordinarily resident in Zambia for a continuous period of at least 10 years. Other conditions: application may be rejected if information is false or concealed, person has not been convicted of an offence and sentenced to imprisonment, nor is an adjudged bankrupt, nor declared a prohibited immigrant nor would approval be contrary to public interest.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person was born outside Zambia and has been ordinarily resident in Zambia for a continuous period of at least 10 years.
Person has not been convicted of an offence and sentenced to imprisonment, nor declared a prohibited immigrant nor would approval be contrary to public interest
category: Exclusion for certain specified crimes, offences or character queries

specification: Person is not an adjudged bankrupt.
category: Requirement (conditions not further specified in database)

specification: Person is or was married to a citizen for a period of at least 5 years. Other conditions: applicant has not been declared a prohibited immigrant nor convicted of an offence and sentenced to imprisonment, and the marriage was not entered into for the purpose of acquiring a status or privilege in relation to immigration or citizenship.
Person is a child adopted by a citizen and resident in Zambia.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person lost citizenship as a result of acquiring the citizenship of another country.
category: Mode restriction: only if citizenship was lost on particular grounds

specification: Person is born in Zimbabwe to a citizen.

Person is born abroad to a parent who was a citizen ordinarily resident in Zimbabwe or working outside Zimbabwe for the state (in which case the person becomes a citizen by birth), or to a citizen (person becomes a citizen by descent). Other conditions: the birth is registered in Zimbabwe.
Person is a child found in Zimbabwe of apparently less than 15 years of age and citizenship and parents are not known.
Person has been continuously and lawfully resident in Zimbabwe for at least 10 years. Other conditions: good character, fit and proper person, renounce other citizenship.
category: Generally applicable provision (see further conditions under A06a-A06f)

specification: Person has been continuously and lawfully resident in Zimbabwe for at least 10 years.
Renunciation of citizenship of another country required.
Person is of good character, fit and proper person.
category: General requirement without specification (good moral character)

specification: Person has been married to a citizen for at least 5 years.
Person is a child who is adopted by a citizen.
category: Age restriction: only if adopted child is a minor

specification: Person is born in Zimbabwe and his/her grandparent is a citizen by birth or descent.
category: Generational restriction: only if person is a grandchild of a citizen
